entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2026 Trim warning from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SourceGen.CodeBehindGenerator #110168
  • Add access to name from HttpClientFactory callbacks #110167
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: allow collection expressions for 'ReadOnlyCollection<T>' #110161
    10.0.0
  • Change/Remove ClientWebSocket ping packet body #110158
  • Request to Add Logging for Configuration Events #110157
    Future
  • [mono] The type initializer for `System.Drawing.DrawingCom` threw an exception: Operation is not supported on this platform #110150
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Runtime tests `LargeStructSize_Mono` and `xprecise1_cs_do` failing on Apple mobile #110149
    10.0.0
  • Configuration binding does not throw when it should #110147
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/Features/HeapExpansion/bestfit-finalize/bestfit-finalize.cmd #110134
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #110133
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #110132
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetReadXmlSchemaTest.SingleElementTreatmentDifference #110131
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/gc/gc/gc.cmd #110128
  • Blazor WASM produces larger biniries with dotnet 9 compared to dotnet 8, even with WasmStripILAfterAOT=true #110143

Closed

  • Memory corruption leading to Access Violation in .NET 9 using parallel reads on a Trie object #110088
  • HttpWebClient always send Cache-Control and Pragma headers when proxy used #110164
  • something.Where(predicate).FirstOrDefault() is faster than something.FirstOrDefault(predicate) #100378
    Future
  • Add an `ISet<T>.AsReadOnly()` extension method #29387
    Future
  • Matrix4x4.CreateReflection gives incorrect results in .NET 9 #110050
  • SPMI replay failure: Assertion failed 'instructionSetFlags.Equals(EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid(instructionSetFlags)) during Pre-Import #110106
    10.0.0
  • In `SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData`: #110159
  • JIT: superpmi-replay failing on win-x64 with crashes #110145
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #110137
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #110138
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Collections #110139
  • How to implement gcc __attribute__((constructor)) when compiling dynamic libraries under Linux #110102
  • [browser][MT] Could not load file or assembly System.Runtime.InteropServices #106067
    10.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Emit doesn't work on linux and wsl ubuntu #110042
  • Test failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.NativeMarshallingAttributeAnalyzerTests.MarshallerWithNoEntryPointAttributes_ReportsDiagnostic #110136
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #110140
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.ComClassGeneratorDiagnostics.NonPartialContainingTypeWarns #110135
  • `ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests` failing on release coreclr windows x86 Release #110151
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Attempting to JIT compile method (wrapper dynamic-method) void object:WriteArrayOfintToXml #110148
    10.0.0
  • Dependency changes when building a self contained application in SDK version 8.0.303 to 8.0.401 #108354
  • [android][infra] Flaky x64 Android failures in PayloadGroup0, failed to install mobile app #102646
    10.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] Failures in System.IO.IsolatedStorage.Tests #101371
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Apple mobile runtime tests can't load BigArray_32_1 in ClassLoader tests, the size is too big. #106797
    10.0.0
  • [Apple][x64] `System.Tests.StringTests.EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison` test failure #108832
    10.0.0
  • Unnecessary sign extension in `Vector512.Create(sbyte)` and `Vector512.Create(short)` #108820
    10.0.0
  • Source generator tests failing with NullReferenceException in TaskReplicator #110127
  • [metadata] Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #103913
    10.0.0
  • Performance regression on .NET 9.0 when creating AVX constants inside loops via System.Numerics.Vector #110125
  • [mono] Tests failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackTraceTests.Ctor_Exception_SkipFrames* #31796
  • [mono] Test failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackTraceTests.ToString_Invoke_ReturnsExpected #31797

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110162
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Arm64-PAC: Add encoding for pointer authentication (PAC) instructions #110160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] force memory views resize after loading assets and after VM start #110156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [MT][Firefox] Exclude tests failing with "Could not load file or assembly 'xunit.assert` #110155
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Limit OpenSSL TLS Session cache for client SSL_CTX instances #110154
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Allow hiding `UnmanagedCallersOnly` exports #110152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Fixed System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests failures #110126
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109709
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.1
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110057
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109813
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Use ABI names for floating registers #109728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add LoongArch64 and RISC-V to list of ports #110144
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: call IsVNNeverNegative in IsNeverNegative #110118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply "Fold "X relop 0" in assertprop" (#110129) #110142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.69, windows: 131.0.6778.70 #109895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix loop index printing #110080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Suppress IL3000 in MsQuicApi constructor #109965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Fold "X relop 0" in assertprop" #110129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2589452 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.1
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • Stop using LINQ in Tensors #109415
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110097
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110078
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Add global search option to 3-opt layout #110089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove dotnet9 nuget feeds #109149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.1
  • Clean up in LowerFusedMultiplyAdd #110113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Put Java JNI function in a separate static library #108513
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.85, windows: 131.0.6778.86 #110114
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Use any reaching def for unreachable uses in incremental SSA builder #110077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Fixed missed case #110122
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Design caching mechanism for type metadata #2807

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Add details to metadata accessors description #2810
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added missing types and renamed Protocol->Existential #2809
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Describe projecting generic structs #2796
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added TypeMetadata, removed SwiftTypeInfo #2804

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for async struct instance methods (potential implementation 2) #2805

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Differences in DEB and RPM metadata #45126
  • Error treated as warning on dotnet sdk source build -> #45104

Closed

  • .NET Core SDK should generate appropriate RID graphs in an app's .deps.json file #1046
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add accidentally removed JS functions back #45124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #45123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #45115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 to Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks #45100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove AspNET substraction logic #44995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Add .npmrc to prevent npmjs usage, even accidentally #45116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Increment branding to allow for post-GA hotfixes #44994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45091
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #45094
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2589314 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities project property #45055
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45095
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Issues

Updated

    Any Time

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Discrepancy between IDE0072 and CS8510 #76080
  • Enumerators incorrectly allow continued enumerator after disposal #76078
  • Flaky test TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources #76069
    17.13
  • Need help to support target runtime "linux-loongarch64" #76065

Closed

  • IDE0251 (Make member readonly) false positive when GetEnumerator() is not readonly #72335
  • Unnecessary assignment ... message - incorrect #72278
  • Pasting content into raw string doesn't respect smart ident #72267
    Backlog
  • Explicit interface member completion doesn't work with params collections #72224
    Backlog
  • Primary constructors: Add node for primary parameter variables #70564
    Backlog
  • Fixer for IDE0251 results in poorly formatted code #69876
    Backlog
  • Completions suggest unreachable variables in static local functions #66982
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]: Breaking change - Make some types static #65909
    Backlog
  • IDE0120 does not work in various cases (Where+Count) #71293
  • Suppress IDE0044/IDE0051 for [InlineArray] types #69143
    17.13
  • When opening IntelliSense using Ctrl - J, current item is not in alphabetical order #71745
    17.13
  • IDE2001 is not compatible with brace placement at the end of a line #72189
    17.13
  • Roslyn Transform "Convert to interpolated string" does not account for quotes #68425
  • Failed assert at AbstractSymbolDisplayService.AbstractSymbolDescriptionBuilder.GetSemanticModel #72020
  • "Convert to raw string" code fix is not always available for `$@` strings #72082
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72075
  • Codefix suggestion: use collection expression spread when collection types don't match #72055
    Backlog
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72074
  • Regular occurrence of `Feature 'Rename' is currently unavailable` error #72036
  • The "return switch" syntax does not generate as efficient IL as normal switch #76075
  • Symbol completion doesn't work on empty nameof in certain attributes #60812
    Backlog
  • Perf ddrits regression in WP64.ProjectManagement 0200.Xaml Designer Load #72010
    Backlog
  • Automatically proffer and register remote brokered services into Roslyn LSP #71998
  • Roslyn LSP server is packaging more than it should #71978
  • Separate reference count. Invocation and inheritance are shown in two parts. #71928
  • Quote completion improvements #71898
  • .NET WinForms: IntelliSense remark IDE0051 shown for own class methods, but not for Form class methods #71870
  • Completion tooltips stop working #71841
  • Interceptor for Code Navigation for Source Generators #71805
  • Hide duplicates caused by "starred" items in IntelliSense #71744
  • `EventHookupCommandHandler` stuck and hangs VS #71643
    Backlog
  • Go to definition doesn't mark the selected symbol the first time but just opens the source file #71568
  • Equality operators are offered in completion in lambda expression in extension method when its input type is inaccessible record #71401
  • [feature request] Insight into what exceptions can reach a certain part of the code #71308
    Backlog
  • IDE0200 is not reported in .NET 8 but works in .NET 7 for injected dependencies #71300
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
    Backlog
  • Symbol loading issue in Visual Studio: 'Go to Definition' in solution with solution filters only opens metadata of class #71074
  • Intellisense cannot determine type when inside a Tuple of Predicates #71041
  • Add some tests covering removing metadata references with MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges #71023
    Backlog
  • Add tests for MSBuildWorkspace on Windows containing options with quotes in them #71021
    Backlog
  • Reduce the size of the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHost directories #70945
  • The ```Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.VisualStudioMSBuildWorkspaceTests.TestOpenProject_WithInvalidProjectReference_SkipFalse_Fails``` unit-test started failing locally for .NET Core #70858
  • Test CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.TestNonBlockingExpandCompletionDoesNotChangeItemOrder failed in CI #70835
  • `IDE0028` suggests collection expression when assigning to a `dynamic` LHS #70822
  • Multiple errors are generated when using Quick Actions on a IDE0028 Message in .NET 8 #70818
    Backlog
  • Completion UI not called when typed char is a number #70798
    18.0
  • SourceGenerator not generating the latest code #70771
  • Find Usages presenter keeps a GC root to a full Solution #70753
  • ??= operator generates IDE0052 notice #70728
    Backlog
  • Line completion forces suggested method parameter when typing quotes, causing an error #70661
  • CompletionService cannot be resolved in Blazor WASM #70404
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35524.17 #76063

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump versions of dependencies coming from maintenance-packages #76076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package versions and remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [vscode] Fix failing official builds #76071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 architecture to roslyn #76064
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Improve the cases that 'simplify linq' works on #76079
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not show uncapturable outer parameters inside static local functions. #76043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix formatting when making an accessor readonly #76054
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make approved api changes #76040
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Fix parameters not showing up in 'nameof' on a method #76017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not offer to remove the primary field from an inline array #76052
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue producing interpolated strings from char literals #76049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Suppress IDE namespace warning #76077
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add comment about supported values of platform switch #76072
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update docs to add a new LangVer #76011
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76074
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix LangVersion computation on non-English locales #76070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.13P2 #76067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add a helper to determine if a type has a specific attribute or not. #76053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support ExperimentalAttribute.Message #76060
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Use partial analysis results to filter out analyzers that need to be executed. #76062
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft] Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose FAR to cohosting #76002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The "dotnet new mvc" template does not configure MapStaticAssets properly #59152
  • The split between desktop and dotnet msbuild in build.ps1 adds unnecessary complexity to the build #59151
  • Perf regression: https #59148
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, updates #59147
  • IStringLocalizer does not find resources if RootNamespace is set but not AssemblyName #59145
  • [FromHeader] behavior has been changed wiht no breaking change info #59139
  • Blazor Authenticate Exception_wasthrown #59137
  • Does Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client support AOT? #59133

Closed

  • Document that QuickGrid may render additional empty rows on the last page when using a paginator that should be appropriately styled #59096
    10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine WebSocketsOutOfProcessTests #59111
  • Preventing Default Behavior for Events Directive Lifecycle #59142
  • Static File Handling Issue in .NET 9 Blazor Server Template (MapStaticAssets) #59123
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #59122
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not firing in MainLayout #58958

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24573.1 #59134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix source build when using `--no-build-js` #59118
    area-blazor
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add option to exception handler middleware to not log error #59074
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView Layout Issues in .NET 9 #26105
    .NET 9 SR2
  • iOS tabbar not visible with 8.0.100 SR10 #26104
  • TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26103
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Update SkiaSharp in maui to the latest 2.x stable to get the security fixes #26099
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Image renders at full window size instead of actual image size on AbsoluteLayout #26094
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [MAUI] error NETSDK1082 & error 'XAPRAS7004 will happen when solution name with "()" or solution in directories with “()” #26092
    Backlog
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst] TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26091
    Backlog
  • BindTapGesture shows error in .net 9 #26088

Closed

  • Dropdown menu on html select item not at correct position in Blazor #26007
  • Publishing to net9.0-ios never completes #26090
  • [net9-rc2] Trim analysis warning IL2026 using XamlTypeResolver with Compiled Bindings #25199
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • DisplayPromptAsync does not accept Enter Key Press from scanner data read #25932
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] An error NETSDK1082 will happen when opening the existing Projects recipeSearch & ManualMauiTests #26054
  • [MAUI] An error 'XAPRAS7004 :System.ArgumentException: must not be null or emptyParameter name: abi ...'will happen when building the existing Projects recipeSearch & ManualMauiTests #26056
  • Unwanted Top and Bottom Spacing in .NET MAUI iOS Simulator #26080
  • Starting up MacOs server for iOS simulator does not work #26084

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Versions.props to 9.011 SR 1.1 #26112
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26111
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [release/9.0.1xx] [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #26110
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #26109
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #26108
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] Remove code that enables/disables Entry #26107
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Remove code that enables/disables Entry #26101
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 19 #26100
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Changes to fix randomly failing tests on CI #26096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • [SECURITY] `Microsoft.Sbom.Targets` nuget for package SBOM #26093

Updated

  • [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26071
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-titlebar, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource #26021
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, area-controls-flyout, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add fallback to ContentPresenter Content binding using reflection #25992
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198

  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663

  • Fall back to loading .NET 8 date strings #26033

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer ObjectEqualsExpression lambdas #35206
    9.0.x
  • DbParameters with same name in FromSql/SqlQueryRaw get incorrectly deduplicated #35196
    10.0.0
  • EF Core 9 : the database operation was expected to affect 1 row(s), but actually affected 0 row(s) #35195

Closed

  • Object equality on object nested in JSON column #35147
  • Feature Request: Adding Support for Tuples in DbContext.Database.SqlQuery<T>() #35163
  • [Regression] Unexpected unbound variable error with closure #35152
    9.0.x
  • How to batch configure global filters on soft deleted entities and non-soft deleted entities #35145
  • Link https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-trimming is broken #34279
    10.0.0
  • [Regression] Exception on query comparing nullable int with ?? fallback on EF Core 9 #35095
    9.0.x
  • [Regression] "Table not found with alias" for column access inside subquery predicate #35118
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35206 - Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer lambdas when constructing shaper with PopulateCollection #35207
  • [release/9.0] Correct VisitUnary operand evaluation in funcletizer (#35172) #35203
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer (#35122) #35202
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate (#35120) #35201
    Servicing-consider
  • Simplify parameter names #35200
  • Add SqlServer translation for DateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly) #35194

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 9.1.0 to 9.1.1 #35205
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.66.0 to 2.67.0 #35204
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer #35122
  • Correct VisitUnary operand evaluation in funcletizer #35172
  • Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate #35120

Updated

  • Adding support for multiple and named query filters #35104
  • [release/9.0] Enable Cosmos vector search on EF9 #35183
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35193
